verbs.description: six years after superstorm [V: sandy] [ARG1: nearly 1 200 new jersey families] still ca n’t go home new jersey governor phil murphy announced monday that more money will now be available to homeowners still struggling to rebuild after superstorm sandy while people who already took out loans from the state to rebuild may now be able to have some or all of their debt forgiv new jersey six years superstorm sandy
